_header: Hail Holy Spirit and joy be unto Thee
_description: A prayer to the guardian angel — thirteen couplets

CamMag13.First Lines:
Hayle holy spiritt and ioye be vnto theMy keper so swete my angell
                    so free…
CamMag13.Last Lines:
…With the blessyng of his ryght honde he me defendeThat
                    raygneth god in trinite in worlde wythoughte ende

BLAdd31042.First Lines: Haile holy spyritt & Ioy be vn to theMy keper so swete myn A[   ]e so fre…
BLAdd31042.Last Lines: …With þe blyssynge of his ryghte hande he me defende[   ] god in trynyte in worlde withowten ende
BLAdd31042.Note: Written two lines of verse per line of manuscript; words of second and last lines illegible due to tear and mend of the leaf; ends “Amen.”
